title: Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve: Nearby Attractions
body: Nearby Attractions              Southern Idaho Visitor Information Learn more about the variety of interesting places to visit in Southern Idaho including 3 other national parks. National Parks in Idaho  Find out about the other national park units in Idaho.         From the high peaks of the Lost River Range to the volcanic craters of Craters of the Moon and everything in between, this scenic byway takes you along one of the most beautiful and scenic drives in the state. More...
